title: Add a Submodule
description: Submodules are a way to include one Git repository as a subdirectory of another Git repository. This can be useful when you want to include a third-party library or a shared codebase in your project. In this lab, you will learn how to add a submodule to a Git repository.

meta.title: Add a Submodule to Git Repository
meta.description: Learn how to include a third-party library or shared codebase as a submodule in your Git project.
